title: Samsung ‘Expert RAW’ camera app will be available on these devices
content:
Samsung’s camera app has some features for both the novice and the advanced user, but the Galaxy S22 helped usher in a new “Expert RAW” camera experience. Now, Samsung has confirmed an expansion of the Expert RAW app to more devices.

more…

The post Samsung ‘Expert RAW’ camera app will be available on these devices appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has confirmed which devices will officially support its advanced Expert RAW camera app, including the new Galaxy S22 series.
